results.title: Simvastatin Improves the Jaw Bone Microstructural Defect Induced by High Cholesterol Diet in Rats by Regulating Autophagic Flux
results.text_hl: The objective of this study is to evaluate the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_Jaw_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007572 @@@jaw bone microstructural defect@@@ and autophagy in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with high @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ diet (HCD).
